test_cases.title: Access Registration Page from Homepage
test_cases.description: Verify that a new user can access the registration page from the homepage.
test_steps: Click on the 'Register' or 'Sign Up' button/link
test_cases.expected_results: Registration page is displayed.

test_cases.title: Successful User Registration with Valid DATF
test_cases.description: Verify that a new user can register with valid email, password, and name.
preconditions: User is on the registration page
test_cases.expected_results: User receives a confirmation email, is redirected to the login page, and account is created.

test_cases.title: Registration with Duplicate Email
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents registration with an email that is already registered.
preconditions: User is on the registration page
test_steps: Enter an email address that is already registered
Enter a valid password and name
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message indicating duplicate email and registration is not allowed.

test_cases.title: Registration with Invalid Email Format
test_cases.description: Verify that the system validates email format during registration.
preconditions: User is on the registration page
test_steps: Enter a valid password and name
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for invalid email format and registration is not allowed.

test_cases.title: Registration with Missing Required Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that the system does not allow registration when required fields are missing.
preconditions: User is on the registration page
test_steps: Leave one or more required fields (email, password, name) blank
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for missing required fields and registration is not allowed.

test_cases.title: Login with Valid Credentials
test_cases.description: Verify that a registered user can log in with valid email and password.
preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_results: User is redirected to their dashboard.

test_cases.title: Login with Invalid Credentials
test_cases.description: Verify that the system displays error messages for invalid login attempts.
preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for invalid credentials and login is not allowed.

test_cases.title: Login with Unregistered Email
test_cases.description: Verify that the system does not allow login with an unregistered email.
preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for invalid credentials and login is not allowed.

test_cases.title: Remember Me Functionality
test_cases.description: Verify that the 'Remember Me' functionality keeps the user logged in across sessions.
preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_results: User remains logged in and is redirected to the dashboard.

test_cases.title: Password Reset Request from Login Page
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can request a password reset from the login page.
preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_results: User receives a password reset email with a secure link.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with Invalid Email
test_cases.description: Verify that the system does not send a password reset email for unregistered emails.
preconditions: User is on the password reset page
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message and does not send a reset email.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with Expired Token
test_cases.description: Verify that the system does not allow password reset with an expired token.
preconditions: User has received a password reset email
test_steps: Click on the password reset link after token expiration
Attempt to set a new password
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for expired token and does not allow password reset.

test_cases.title: Successful Password Reset
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can successfully reset their password using a valid token.
preconditions: User has received a password reset email
test_steps: Click on the password reset link
test_cases.expected_results: User is notified of successful password reset and can log in with the new password.

test_cases.title: Access and Edit Profile from Dashboard
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can access and edit their profile from the dashboard.
test_steps: Edit name, email, or profile picture
test_cases.expected_results: Changes are saved and reflected immediately; user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Profile Update with Invalid Email Format
test_cases.description: Verify that the system validates email format during profile update.
preconditions: User is on the profile edit page
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message and does not save changes.

test_cases.title: Profile Update with Duplicate Email
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents updating profile to an email already in use.
preconditions: Another user exists with the target email
test_steps: Enter an email address already used by another user
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for duplicate email and does not save changes.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Displays User Info
test_cases.description: Verify that the dashboard displays the user's name and profile picture.
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard displays user's name and profile picture.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Shows Recent Activity and Notifications
test_cases.description: Verify that the dashboard displays recent activity and notifications.
preconditions: User has recent activity and notifications
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard shows recent activity and notifications.

test_cases.title: Customize Dashboard Widgets
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can customize dashboard widgets.
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard reflects customized widgets immediately.

test_cases.title: Create New Project with Valid DATF
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can create a new project with valid name, description, and privacy settings.
test_steps: Enter valid project name, description, and select privacy setting
test_cases.expected_results: Project is created, appears in project list, and user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Create Project with Missing Required Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that the system does not allow project creation when required fields are missing.
preconditions: User is on the create project page
test_steps: Leave project name or description blank
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message and project is not created.

test_cases.title: Edit Project Details Successfully
test_cases.description: Verify that a project owner can edit project name, description, and privacy.
test_steps: Edit project name, description, or privacy
test_cases.expected_results: Changes are saved and reflected immediately in the project list; user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Edit Project with Invalid DATF
test_cases.description: Verify that the system validates changes before saving during project edit.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message and does not save changes.

test_cases.title: Delete Project with Confirmation
test_cases.description: Verify that a project owner can delete a project after confirmation.
test_cases.expected_results: Project is removed from project list, user receives notification, and project cannot be accessed or restored.

test_cases.title: Attempt to Access Deleted Project
test_cases.description: Verify that deleted projects cannot be accessed or restored.
test_steps: Attempt to access the deleted project via direct URL or project list
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error or 'not found' message; project cannot be accessed.

test_cases.title: Invite Team Members via Email
test_cases.description: Verify that a project owner can invite team members via email from the project page.
test_steps: Enter email addresses of team members to invite
test_cases.expected_results: Invited users receive an email with a join link; invitations are sent successfully.

test_cases.title: Prevent Duplicate Invitations
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents sending duplicate invitations to the same email.
preconditions: User has already invited a team member
test_steps: Attempt to invite the same email address again
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message and does not send duplicate invitation.

test_cases.title: Invited User Appears in Team List After Accepting
test_cases.description: Verify that invited users appear in the project team list after accepting invitation.
test_steps: Click on join link in email
test_cases.expected_results: User appears in the project team list.

test_cases.title: Assign Roles to Team Members
test_cases.description: Verify that a project owner can assign roles to team members.
test_cases.expected_results: Role assignment is reflected immediately; user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Permissions Enforcement
test_cases.description: Verify that the system enforces role-based permissions for project actions.
preconditions: User has a specific role (e.g., Viewer)
test_steps: Attempt to perform an action not permitted for the assigned role (e.g., edit project as Viewer)
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents the action and displays an appropriate error message.

test_cases.title: Only Project Owners Can Change Roles
test_cases.description: Verify that only project owners can change team member roles.
test_steps: Attempt to change another team member's role
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents role change and displays an error message.

test_cases.title: Create Task with Valid DATF
test_cases.description: Verify that a team member can create a task with title, description, due date, and assignee.
test_steps: Enter valid title, description, due date, and select assignee(s)
test_cases.expected_results: Task appears in the project task list; user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Create Task with Missing Required Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that the system does not allow task creation when required fields are missing.
test_steps: Leave title or due date blank
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message and task is not created.

test_cases.title: Assign Task to Multiple Team Members
test_cases.description: Verify that a task can be assigned to multiple team members.
test_cases.expected_results: Task is created and assigned to all selected team members.

test_cases.title: Edit Task Details Successfully
test_cases.description: Verify that a team member with appropriate permissions can edit task details.
test_steps: Edit title, description, due date, or assignee
test_cases.expected_results: Changes are saved and reflected immediately; user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Edit Task Without Permission
test_cases.description: Verify that users without appropriate permissions cannot edit tasks.
preconditions: User does not have edit permissions
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents editing and displays an error message.

test_cases.title: Mark Task as Complete
test_cases.description: Verify that a team member can mark a task as complete from the task list.
test_cases.expected_results: Task status is updated to complete, visually distinguished, and user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Filter Completed Tasks
test_cases.description: Verify that completed tasks can be filtered or hidden in the task list.
test_steps: Apply filter to show/hide completed tasks
test_cases.expected_results: Task list updates to show/hide completed tasks as per filter.

test_cases.title: Add Comment to Task
test_cases.description: Verify that a team member can add a comment to any task.
test_cases.expected_results: Comment is added, displays author and timestamp, and is visible to all project members.

test_cases.title: Edit and Delete Own Comment
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can edit and delete their own comments on tasks.
test_cases.expected_results: Comment is updated or removed as per action.

test_cases.title: Receive Notification for New Comment
test_cases.description: Verify that users receive notifications for new comments on tasks.
preconditions: Another user adds a comment to a task
test_steps: Add a comment to a task
test_cases.expected_results: User receives notification for new comment.

test_cases.title: Receive Notification for Task Assignment
test_cases.description: Verify that users receive notifications for task assignments.
test_steps: Check notifications in dashboard and email
test_cases.expected_results: User receives notification in dashboard and via email.

test_cases.title: Customize Notification Preferences
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can customize notification preferences.
test_cases.expected_results: Notification settings are updated and applied.

test_cases.title: Mark Notification as Read
test_cases.description: Verify that notifications are marked as read when viewed.
test_cases.expected_results: Notification is marked as read.

test_cases.title: Search Projects and Tasks by Keyword
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can search for projects and tasks using keywords.
test_steps: Enter a keyword in the search bar
test_cases.expected_results: Matching projects and tasks are displayed.

test_cases.title: Search Results Filtering
test_cases.description: Verify that search results can be filtered by status, date, and assignee.
test_steps: Enter a keyword in the search bar
Apply filters for status, date, and assignee
test_cases.expected_results: Search results update according to applied filters.

test_cases.title: Export Project DATF in CSV Format
test_cases.description: Verify that a project owner can export project dATF in CSV format.
test_cases.expected_results: System generates and downloads CSV file with project details, tasks, and team members.

test_cases.title: Export Project DATF in PDF Format
test_cases.description: Verify that a project owner can export project dATF in PDF format.
test_cases.expected_results: System generates and downloads PDF file with project details, tasks, and team members.

test_cases.title: View Activity Log with Filters
test_cases.description: Verify that a user can view and filter the activity log by date, user, and action type.
test_steps: Apply filters for date, user, and action type
test_cases.expected_results: Activity log updates according to applied filters.

test_cases.title: Set Task Priority
test_cases.description: Verify that a team member can assign priority levels to tasks.
test_steps: Set priority to High, Medium, or Low
test_cases.expected_results: Task displays selected priority visually and user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Archive Completed Project
test_cases.description: Verify that a project owner can archive a completed project.
test_cases.expected_results: Project is moved to archived section, is read-only, and user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Restore Archived Project
test_cases.description: Verify that a project owner can restore an archived project.
test_cases.expected_results: Project is restored to active projects and user receives confirmation.

summary: 52 comprehensive test cases have been generated, covering all major user stories and requirements including user management, project and task management, collaboration, notifications, search, export, and activity tracking. The test cases include positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for thorough coverage.
